definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Dr. Arthur Pang is examining a pregnant woman with traditional instrument in Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 彭伟强医生在达尔富尔地区为一名孕妇检查。

sentences.english: That will have very negative consequences on the prospect of peace in Darfur, " said Gambari."
sentences.chinese: 这对于达尔富尔地区的和平前景来说是相当负面的。

sentences.english: More than 9, 000 international military and police personnel are in Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 在达尔富尔有将近9千多名国际军队和警方人员。
苏丹西部达尔富尔地区是恐怖主义么？

sentences.english: It is already involved in peacekeeping operations in places including Haiti and Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 中国已经参与了在海地和达尔富尔的为何行动。

sentences.english: Sudanese authorities are thought to have detained hundreds of Darfurians in the aftermath of the attack.
sentences.chinese: 据信苏丹当局在袭击发生后拘留了数百名达尔富尔人。

sentences.english: On the issue of Darfur, our position has always been to promote a dialogue and peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 关于达尔富尔问题，我们的立场是劝和促谈。

sentences.english: We are very concerned for the population remaining behind in southern Darfur," Nicolai said.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常担心留在达尔富尔南部的人口。

sentences.english: The genocide in Darfur shames the conscience of us all.
sentences.chinese: 达尔富尔的种族灭绝使我们所有的良知蒙羞。

sentences.english: We sincerely wish an early and proper settlement of the Darfur issue.
sentences.chinese: 我们也衷心希望达尔富尔问题早日得到妥善解决。

sentences.english: The rest of time I will be focusing on rehabbing and also working on my film on Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 同时还筹备我在达尔富尔的电影事业。

sentences.english: He also said the party would not contest polls in Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 他还表示，他们的政党不会在达尔富尔地区拉选票。

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
African Union (AU), abbr. for 非洲聯盟|非洲联盟
